beverage.name: Americano
beverage.description: A smooth and strong coffee made by mixing espresso with hot water

beverage.name: Cappuccino
beverage.description: A creamy and indulgent coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and velvety milk foam

beverage.name: Cafe Mocha
beverage.description: A delicious blend of rich espresso, creamy steamed milk, and decadent chocolate, topped with a light layer of whipped cream

beverage.name: Cafe Latte
beverage.description: A smooth and creamy coffee made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam

beverage.name: Hot Chocolate
beverage.description: A rich and creamy treat made with velvety chocolate and steamed milk, topped with a fluffy cloud of whipped cream or marshmallows

beverage.name: Espresso
beverage.description: A concentrated shot of pure coffee, brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans

beverage.name: Caramel Macchiato
beverage.description: A sweet and creamy coffee made with espresso, steamed milk, and vanilla syrup, topped with a drizzle of rich caramel

beverage.name: Matcha Latte
beverage.description: A smooth and vibrant drink made with finely ground green tea powder, steamed milk, and a touch of sweetness

beverage.name: Oreo Milkshake
beverage.description: A creamy and decadent treat blended with rich vanilla ice cream, milk, and chunks of Oreo cookies. Topped with whipped cream and extra cookie crumbles

beverage.name: Blueberry Frappe
beverage.description: A cool and fruity blended drink made with sweet blueberries, creamy milk, and a hint of vanilla topped with whipped cream

beverage.name: Milo Shake
beverage.description: A creamy and chocolatey delight made with rich Milo powder, cold milk, and a scoop of ice cream
